Package itunesq

Class TracksWindow

java.lang.Object
itunesq.TracksWindow
public class TracksWindow extends Object
Class that handles the display tracks window. This window shows all tracks, a set of tracks resulting from a query, or duplicate tracks.
Author:
Jon

  • Method Details

    • saveWindowAttributes

      public void saveWindowAttributes​(ListQueryType.Type queryType, String queryStr, org.apache.pivot.collections.List<String> columnNames)
      Saves window attributes used for various types of queries.
      Parameters:
      queryType - type of query that generated the tracks to be displayed
      queryStr - string representation of the query
      columnNames - column names associated with the query

    • displayTracks

      public void displayTracks​(org.apache.pivot.wtk.Display display, Skins.Window window, org.apache.pivot.collections.List<Track> tracks, org.apache.pivot.wtk.Window owningWindow) throws IOException, org.apache.pivot.serialization.SerializationException
      Displays the tracks in a new window.
      Parameters:
      display - display object for managing windows
      window - the type of window containing the displayed tracks
      tracks - list of tracks to be displayed
      owningWindow - window on which to open the new window, or null
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs trying to read the BXML file.
      org.apache.pivot.serialization.SerializationException - If an error occurs trying to deserialize the BXML file.

    • handleTrackDetailsPopup

      public void handleTrackDetailsPopup​(org.apache.pivot.collections.Map<String,​String> trackRowData, org.apache.pivot.wtk.Display display, org.apache.pivot.wtk.Window owningWindow) throws IOException, org.apache.pivot.serialization.SerializationException
      Creates the track info details dialog.

      This is called when the user right clicks on a track in a table view, for example the filtered tracks window, or the list of tracks in a selected playlist.

      Parameters:
      trackRowData - map of the track data from the table view row that was clicked
      display - display for opening the dialog
      owningWindow - window that owns the track info dialog
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs trying to read the BXML file.
      org.apache.pivot.serialization.SerializationException - If an error occurs trying to deserialize the BXML file.

    • getFilteredTrackData

      public org.apache.pivot.collections.List<org.apache.pivot.collections.HashMap<String,​String>> getFilteredTrackData()
      Gets the list of tracks table data for a filtered list of tracks.
      Returns:
      list of tracks table data
